hero.title: Professional spaces, professionally cleaned
hero.subtitle: Reliable janitorial services for offices, retail, medical, and industrial facilities. Nightly, weekly, or custom schedules. Insured, bonded, and trusted by businesses since 2008. Keep your workplace spotless.

about.title: Commercial Cleaning Experts
about.subtitle: Serving businesses since 2008
about.content: ProClean provides comprehensive janitorial services to businesses across all industries. Our trained cleaning crews work on your schedule using commercial-grade equipment and products. Fully insured, bonded, and COVID-19 certified.

products.name: Office Cleaning
products.description: Complete office janitorial service. Trash, vacuuming, bathrooms, break rooms, and dusting. Nightly or weekly schedules.

products.name: Medical Facility Cleaning
products.description: Hospital-grade disinfection for medical offices, clinics, and dental practices. OSHA compliant cleaning protocols.

products.name: Retail Cleaning
products.description: Keep your store looking great for customers. Floors, windows, bathrooms, and fitting rooms. Flexible scheduling.

products.name: Floor Care Services
products.description: Professional floor stripping, waxing, and buffing. Carpet cleaning and tile maintenance. Quarterly or as needed.

products.name: Window Cleaning
products.description: Interior and exterior window cleaning for commercial buildings. Monthly or quarterly service available.

products.name: Deep Cleaning Service
products.description: Intensive top-to-bottom cleaning for offices, warehouses, or facilities. Perfect for quarterly maintenance.

items.text: ProClean has serviced our 10,000 sq ft office for 3 years. Reliable, professional, and always thorough. Our employees appreciate coming to a clean workplace every morning.
items.author: Michael Bradford
items.title: Facilities Manager, Tech Company

items.text: As a medical practice, cleanliness is critical. ProClean's staff is trained in proper disinfection protocols. They're reliable and detail-oriented. Highly recommend!
items.author: Dr. Sarah Kim
items.title: Medical Director

items.text: We switched to ProClean last year and couldn't be happier. Better service at a lower cost. Their communication is excellent and the cleaning is consistently great.
items.author: Robert Chen
items.title: Store Manager, Retail Chain

members.name: James Martinez
members.title: Operations Manager
members.bio: 15+ years in commercial cleaning management. Oversees all cleaning crews, quality control, and client relationships. Committed to exceeding expectations.
